Unit Price Prediction Project

Unit Price Prediction Project

About

This project aims to predict future unit prices based on average hourly rates, materials, and overhead inputs. Data was collected from FRED (Federal Reserve Economic Data), where we track commodity prices. The goal is to create a "WHAT IF" scenario on the supply chain side to provide insights and, hopefully, improvements.

KPI Dashboard

A visualization of unit price breakdowns. Contains:

  • Unit Price Monthly Breakdown: ACT vs Budget trends, items used the most over the months.
  • Item Breakdown: Which items are popular over the years.
  • Commodity Breakdown: Commodity popularity and spending.
  • Price Prediction: A forecast of unit price.
